earth.name: Earth
earth.description: A diverse world with many lands and peoples

europe.name: Europe
europe.description: A continent of ancient kingdoms and modern nations

britain.name: Britain
britain.description: A green and pleasant land with rolling hills

southwest.name: Southwest England
southwest.description: A region of moors, coasts, and ancient stone circles

river_avon_bank.name: River Avon Bank
river_avon_bank.description: You stand beside the gentle River Avon. The water flows steadily, and you can see fish occasionally breaking the surface. A small wooden bridge crosses the river upstream, and there's a path leading into the nearby woods.

connections.description: Follow the path into the woods

avon_bridge.name: Avon Bridge
avon_bridge.description: A sturdy wooden bridge spans the River Avon. From here you have a good view of the river in both directions. The bridge leads to a small village on the other side.

woodland_path.name: Woodland Path
woodland_path.description: A narrow path winds through ancient oak trees. The canopy filters the sunlight, creating dappled shadows on the forest floor. You can hear birds singing overhead.

connections.description: Follow the path deeper into the woods

ancient_oak.name: Ancient Oak
ancient_oak.description: A massive oak tree stands before you, its trunk wider than a man is tall. The tree's branches spread wide, creating a natural canopy. There's a hollow in the trunk that looks large enough to shelter in.

village_square.name: Village Square
village_square.description: A small village square with a stone well in the center. Several cottages surround the square, and there's a small tavern with a sign showing a red fox. Villagers go about their daily business.

red_fox_tavern.name: Red Fox Tavern
red_fox_tavern.description: A cozy tavern with low wooden beams and a crackling fireplace. The air is filled with the smell of ale and roasted meat. Several locals sit at tables, and the innkeeper stands behind a polished wooden bar.

asia.name: Asia
asia.description: A vast continent of ancient civilizations and diverse cultures

japan.name: Japan
japan.description: A land of cherry blossoms, samurai, and modern technology

kyoto.name: Kyoto
kyoto.description: The ancient capital, home to countless temples and traditional gardens

bamboo_forest.name: Bamboo Forest
bamboo_forest.description: A serene bamboo grove where tall stalks sway gently in the breeze. The filtered sunlight creates a peaceful atmosphere, and the sound of rustling leaves is almost musical.

connections.description: Follow the stone path to the temple

temple_garden.name: Temple Garden
temple_garden.description: A meticulously maintained Zen garden with carefully placed rocks, raked gravel, and a small pond. The garden radiates tranquility and invites contemplation.

temple_interior.name: Temple Interior
temple_interior.description: A peaceful temple hall with tatami mats and sliding paper doors. Incense burns gently, and the air is filled with the sound of distant chanting.

africa.name: Africa
africa.description: A continent of vast savannas, dense jungles, and ancient kingdoms

egypt.name: Egypt
egypt.description: Land of the pharaohs, pyramids, and the mighty Nile

nile_delta.name: Nile Delta
nile_delta.description: Where the great Nile River meets the sea, creating fertile lands

nile_riverbank.name: Nile Riverbank
nile_riverbank.description: You stand on the banks of the mighty Nile River. The water flows steadily northward, carrying silt that has nourished this land for millennia. Fishing boats dot the water, and palm trees line the shore.

connections.description: Walk to the nearby fishing village

fishing_village.name: Fishing Village
fishing_village.description: A small village of mud-brick houses where fishermen live and work. Nets hang to dry, and the smell of cooking fish fills the air. Children play in the dusty streets.
